article: the european union commissioner responsible for enlargement was expected in belgrade on monday officially to open talks on a key agreement paving the way for serbia-montenegro 's closer ties with the ##-member bloc , officials said sunday .
abstract: eu official to open talks with belgrade on future eu membership
